## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (PEP8)
- [ ] I have added type hints where appropriate

- [ ] All tests pass locally (`python -m pytest`)

- [ ] I have added examples if introducing new features
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked my code for performance regressions
